Pan winked before saying, ''Don't think so princess.'' She left Bra hanging, literally, as she left the room. Bra was full of righteous fury as she was hung to dry. It was a bewildered Bulma that finally stumbled upon this interesting scene. Bra was still fuming as her mother helped her done and got her some ice.
1511.title: C string

info.description: Hey, thought I'd make this and hope people contribute! Main rule, nothing too extreme, and just girl wedgies, otherwise, write as much as you want, if you want me to write something, let me know!
